Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerBoardSetup, PlayerDrawing, PlayerInfo, PlayerSetup
public class Player extends Object implements PlayerSetup, PlayerBoardSetup, PlayerInfo, PlayerDrawing
The Player Object. The player implements PlayerInfo to expose its properties and PlayerDrawable
